flawed_nl_solution:
It takes 10 minutes to wash 4 windows and he has 64 windows so that breaks down to 64/4 = 61.0 units
It takes 10 minutes to wash a unit of windows and he has 61.0 units so 10*61.0 = <<10*61.0=610.0>>610.0 minutes

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16.0, not 61.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
